Name: Washington Red Apple
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Slowly DRIZZLE grenadine so it sinks to form the red base.
Review: A long version of the popular Sour Apple Martini.
History: Created in the late 1990s - early 2000s by Wayne Collins in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Washington Red Apple contains 216 calories
